meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 has been released. This is an important release introduceing a few changes ramping up to Vert.x 4.

meta.title: VS Code Vert.x Starter Extension
meta.summary: Today, we are really excited to announce the Visual Studio Code Vert.x Starter extension. It allows you to create a Vert.x project, customize the creation, and search for dependencies.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.1
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.7.1, a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.7.x and a few small features.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that the Eclipse Vert.x version 3.7.0 has been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.6.3
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.6.3, a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.6.x.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.6.2
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.6.2, a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.6.x.
